Name: Cam Circle VR
About the game: Cam Circle VR is a mixed reality (MR) tool that shows part of your real world in VR . Activate it by double tapping the headset or by pressing both grip buttons. Cam Circle currently supports HTC Vive, Vive Pro 1, Vive Pro 2 and Valve Index headsets. Cam Circle can be used while running other VR software and games.
